name: EasyTranslate
author: EasyTranslate

sections.description:
Create the perfect solution that fits your exact translation & localisation needs. With our flexible tiers, you can build your own customised pricing plan that includes the features that your project demands and in the quantity you need them. Try our Freemium solution and explore the features we have to offer – and yes it is completely free. Check the following link to see what is included:
https://easytranslate.com/en/pricing/
We even offer you 25€ to get started.

Features

  • Machine translate your content through custom MTs or general NMTs
  • Translate your content with your team of freelance translators
  • Set a price limit to secure price approval before sourcing your content for translation
  • Review your content in the Easytranslate platform, and automatically import updated content

Benefits

  • No re-formatting of documents, compatible with all editable files
  • Multi-stage translation process; Translation, translation & review, or Machine Translation
  • User friendly Editor function
  • Translation Memory search field to streamline translations
  • Term Base function to ensure consistency
  • Built-in chat with linguists
  • Built-in support chat
  • Roles and permissions feature, allowing you to invite in-house proofreaders or colleagues and deciding what functionalities should be available to them
  • Organisational folder structure to maintain organisation
  • Testing and onboarding of linguists from representative content and a tailored style guide to ensure consistency and top noch quality
  • Automated payments to translation suppliers
  • Wallet feature allowing you to process as many translations as you’d like and receive one invoice rather than heaps
  • Complete pricing transparency
  • Support to optimise translation flow and localisation processes
  • Save time! Build your custom workflows (when this happens > do this)
  • String Library > enabling you to localise your strings faster. This is especially useful within Apps
  • Support for WooCommerce + WPML
  • Support for Yoast SEO + WPML

More information?

Go to our website

Need any assistance?

Reach out to us via Chat, Email or phone – you can find us here
sections.installation:
1. Install the Wpml-string-translation plugin
  2. Install the Sitepress-multilingual-cms plugin
  3. Install the Wpml-translation-management plugin
  4. Sign up for our services
  5. Install EasyTranslate plugin
